# Dump code to file


## dput / dget

Single object only

```{r}
dummy_file <- c('c:/temp/dummy.R')
if (file.exists(dummy_file)) file.remove(dummy_file)

y <- data.frame(a = 1, b = "a")
# output to screen
dput(y)
# output to file
dput(y, dummy_file)
# read file
new.y <- dget(dummy_file)
# display
new.y
```


## dump / source

multiple objects to file

```{r}
x <- "foo"
y <- data.frame(a = 1, b = "a")
 
dump(c("x","y"), file=dummy_file)
 
rm(x,y)
source(dummy_file)
x
y

```

```{r, include=FALSE}
if (file.exists(dummy_file)) file.remove(dummy_file)
```
